posts.author: Alohakid
posts.title: HUGE: Secret Service Knew There Was a Credible Threat Against Trump’s Life 10 Days Before Butler Rally Where Trump was Shot and Innocent Supporter was Killed – DID NOT SHARE WITH STAFF ON GROUND

link_metadata.description: A new Government Accountability Office (GAO) report reveals that the Secret Service during Biden’s presidency did not alert the team responsible for securing Trump’s July 13, 2024, rally, where an assassination attempt was made, despite being made aware of a threat against Trump’s life ten days prior.
link_metadata.title: HUGE: Secret Service Knew There Was a Credible Threat Against Trump's Life 10 Days Before Butler Rally Where Trump was Shot and Innocent Supporter was Killed - DID NOT SHARE WITH STAFF ON GROUND | The Gateway Pundit | by Jordan Conradson

posts.author: _Liberty_Prime_
posts.title: The idea that a movement has failed because those in it don’t agree 100% of the time is dangerous.

twitter.content:
The idea that a movement has failed because those in it don’t agree 100% of the time is dangerous. We’re not robots. We’re not in a cult (sorry, Lefties, we’re not). 

It’s good for us to discuss important topics and yes, disagree on them. That’s how we grow and get stronger.

posts.author: madeaprofilejustforu
posts.title: How Epstein did or didn’t die is immaterial. I don’t give a fuck if he disappeared into his own ass hole. While impressive, it can’t be enough to shut us up. Looking the other way now means WE WILL NEVER GET THE ANSWER TO THE 47 BEELLION DOLLAR QUESTION: WHO FUCKED THE KIDS???

posts.raw_content:
Epstein was a Mossad asset tasked with collecting blackmail material on American politicians and business leaders so that they could be controlled by Israel. Everyone knows this. Even the shills, especially the shills. 

The Israeli Deep State has launched influence operations, not to keep this a secret, but to make it too toxic to talk about. So they can retain their influence in US policy. Somehow, they've gotten Trump to go along with this. I don' know how or why, but this is clear. 

The question is what are we going to do? Are we going to abandon DJT, the man who risked everything for this country, who literally took a bullet for us? Not me. I have children. I have a responsibility to leave them the best country I can. DJT is an imperfect vessel, but I believe he is part of God's plan.

So what to do? Do I blame the Jews? Hmm, that doesn't match my life experience. Where two of my most MAGA friends are Jewish. And even my libtard Jewish friends are kind and not advocates of kid fucking. My problem is with the Israeli Deep State, the same people who ran the Epstein ring also blackmailed Clinton into releasing Jonathan Pollard using recordings of him having phone sex with Monica Lewinsky. Now Bill Clinton is a rapist, but at that moment he was also the President. If the Israeli Deep State wants to control my country then as a loyal patriotic American it is my duty to kick them in the balls, even if it hurts my foot.

So, no more weapon systems for Israel. Fuck them. 
No more intelligence for Israel. Fuck them.
And above all, no more foreign wars for Israel. They can sort out Iran and Iraq and the rest of the Arab world on their own. Fuck them.
We have plenty of our own oil and I'm not sending another American to die for those treacherous snakes.

Or the people of Israel can rise up and turn out the Deep State, if they're willing to tell the truth, apologize and surrender their Deep State actors to face justice here, then and only then would I be willing to reconsider.

posts.raw_content:
The Epstein outrage isn't only about what Epstein did.

It's the same outrage as 2 trillion missing from DoD without a prosecution

It's the same outrage as the financial crisis without a prosecution

It's the same outrage as Bengazi without a prosecution

Its the same outrage as Hillary's emails without a prosecution

It's the same outrage as Russiagate hoax without a prosecution

It's the same outrage as the Impeachment hoax without a prosecution

It's the same outrage as the summer of love without a prosecution

It's the same outrage as the stolen election hoax without a prosecution

It's the same outrage as Afghanistan withdrawal without a prosecution

It's the same outrage as the naked short selling without a prosecution

It's the same outrage as the poison covid shot without a prosecution

It's the same outrage as the autopen president without a prosecution

It's the same outrage as the for-profit open borders industry operating in the open for years without a single prosecution


The President often says if there's no border we don't have a country. well
if we don't have equal protection under the law, if we don't follow the rule of law then we don't have a country either. We have an economic zone where the international wealthy pay insignificant fines for rampant criminality.

If there is a two tiered justice system there is no justice system if there's no justice system there is no country.
